Sys::Mq Class Reference

Documentation

This class is a wrapper for POSIX message queues.

Public Member Functions

int open (const char *name, int oflag, mode_t mode=0, const struct mq_attr *attr=0)
 
int create (const char *name, int oflag, mode_t mode, long flags, long maxmsg, long msgsize)
 

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Sys::Mq::flags

Bitwise flags for open()

Enumerator
CREATE 

Create a new message queue.

EXCL 

Create exclusively.

EXCLUSIVE 

Create exclusively.

Member Function Documentation

int  oflag,
mode_t  mode,
long  flags,
long  maxmsg,
long  msgsize 
)

See below for details.

This method creates a new message queue.

Parameters
nameThe name of the queue
oflagEXCLUSIVE or 0
modePermissions
flagsMessage queue flags
maxmsgMax number of messages
msgsizeMessage size
Returns
Less than zero for an error (use perror())

int  oflag,
mode_t  mode = 0,

This method opens a message queue

Parameters
